title: Logarithmic Operators in AdS_3/CFT_2
abstract: We discuss the relation between singletons in AdS_3 and logarithmic operators in the CFT on the boundary. In 2 dimensions there can be more logarithmic operators apart from those which correspond to singletons in AdS, because logarithmic operators can occur when the dimensions of primary fields differ by an integer instead of being equal. These operators may be needed to account for the greybody factor for gauge bosons in the bulk.
